column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////In town on business
column2: and wanted to experience Chicago pizza first hand. All the positive Yelp ratings directed me here and it didn't disappoint! Its a bit of a wait (45 min) to get a table at dinnertime
column3: but it was well worth it. To start we polished off some buffalo wings
column4: followed by the Lou's pizza (w/o mushrooms)
column5: as I don't eat pork. I was a bit disappointed that there were no beef options as toppings
column6: but the pizza was still amazing. I'd definitely recommend it!
